response_parsed.title: Implementing Data Pipelines Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a step-by-step guide on how to create and implement data pipelines using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs, with Python 3.12+. By the end of this guide, you'll have built a simple but functional data pipeline that demonstrates the key principles and best practices.
key_points: Defining APIs for data ingestion and processing
Implementing data validation using FastAPI's built-in features
Managing asynchronous operations with FastAPI's async support

app = FastAPI()
...
